title: For Trade :: 1887 Old Judge - JIM FOGARTY - Philadelphia
author: cozmokramer

posts.post_title: For Trade :: 1887 Old Judge - JIM FOGARTY - Philadelphia
posts.post_content:
I have an 1887 OJ Jim Fogarty (SGC 10) available for trade... 
Great photo, just some residue on the reverse keeping the grade down.

Looking to trade for another OJ that I need in similar condition. 
I will also consider trading for two beaters (trimmed and/or skinned).

Fogarty - Philadelphia - SGC 10 

[IMG]http://247HQ.com/3OJS.jpg[/IMG]

If you get no trade offers, I might be interested in buying the Fogarty.

Joshua

Thanks Ken...

I just sent an email to your regular email address

Eric
Radford and Flint have been traded... Just have the Fogarty left

Still have the fogarty available for trade...

Looking for either another OJ in similar condition that I need or possible two beaters (skinned and/or trimmed) in exchange for this SGC 10 Fogarty with great photo.
